snippet: Bernhard Langer shot a five-under-par 67 to open a three-stroke lead in the Champions Tour’s Montreal Championship in Sainte-Julie, Quebec.
abstract: Bernhard Langer takes first-round lead in Champions Tour’s Montreal Championship in Sainte-Julie, Quebec; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Bernhard Langer shot a five-under-par 67 to open a three-stroke lead in the Champions Tour’s Montreal Championship in Sainte-Julie, Quebec.
